Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory307.png'}
{3: 'Reluctantly, you have all decided to travel with Nanami.'}

{3: 'You follow her to an abandoned mall inside City 015, where fallen shelves and items have scattered all over the place. Yet, there is a certain order to it, as if someone has briefly cleaned up the area.'}
{2: 'So... what were those?', 3: '6'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "They're my new discovery here!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "They're a very important part of my battle strategy, which was why Nanami had a plan to hunt them down!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But now it's all messed up because of you! Aye-yi-yi-yi!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Hunt them down? So you mean you were trying to deal with them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Well, I don't want them to wander about. It's dangerous out here!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "...And a few other things. I'll explain later.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'To them, duh! Just now they would\'ve been "purified" if they weren\'t careful, wouldn\'t they?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...Regardless, Nanami does things her way! I never act without reasons!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I was trying to deal with them alright! But you've disrupted my plan, so you have to fix it by doing exactly what I tell you to! Nanami's got a plan!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Your... plan? You aren't acting on instinct for once, Nanami!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'd like to be one of the smart ones once in a while, is what it is.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'After all, I couldn\'t have "instinct" them from the mine they were inhabiting to here, could I?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...Something wrong with that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I mean, they couldn't have popped up out of nowhere, right? Like, you pop up from Babylonia—same idea.", 4: '2'}
{2: "So what's your plan?", 3: '30'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hunt them down, I told you! To lure them here from where they were...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Is that possible? How would you do that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "If we want to hunt something, first, we'll need to collect bait!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Exactly! And Nanami knows where you can find baits. After that, we just need to dress it up a bit...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What bait are we talking about here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Information classified! You'll find out when the time is right!", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Although Nanami could've handled it by herself, it wouldn't hurt to have a few extra pairs of hands helping if we want to hunt them down... It takes a while to collect the baits, after all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Who says I'm helping?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey, Bianca, let's go find that thing ourselves! You wouldn't join this ridiculous plan of hers, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: '...Commandant, what are you thinking?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I guess we have to listen to Nanami for now.', 3: '47'}
{3: 'Defeated, Karenina shakes her head. But she was the one who rushed to help Nanami in the first place, so she cannot make herself sit it out.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Fine! I can't leave you alone, now, can I? What if something happens to you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Just to be safe, please come with us as well, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "In that case—Nanami's big hunt is ready to go! Everyone, on your mark! Get set! Collect the baits!", 4: '1'}
